value:
Since coming to Askr, I've been
feeling great! If I can hold on to
that, I know I can be of use to you.

Firene is a peaceful kingdom, full of
flowers. I'd love to show you around
Florra Mill Town someday!

Do I see some big muscles hiding
under that robe? No? Well, let's
train and bulk up together!

I've heard of a beautiful flower garden
here in Askr. Would you like to go? We
could run there—then it's training too!

Hup! Hup! Yes! Training went
smoothly today. Check out that
definition!

I'm Firene's crown prince, Alfred! I
jogged right over to give you this. It's
from $Nf.

Great results. Take a look at my
muscles and you'll see why!

Not bad! My muscles are singing a
happy tune!

Sometimes things just work out
this way. That's all there is to it.

If you give me something, I'll make
use of it. That's why I'm training
so hard.

I'm Alfred, crown prince of Firene. As
soon as you summoned me, I dashed
here with all my might!

Hey there! I was just thinking about
you, and here you are. Lucky me!$k$pI've gotten even stronger since I got
here—big gains! And that's thanks to
you. To think that I was worried...$k$pSummoned to fight, all that stress
and strain... I thought it would take
its toll on me!$k$pTurns out I had nothing to fear. Even
when I've been down, you're there.
With your support, I'm staying strong!$k$pWhat I mean to say is, you have my
thanks. My strength is your strength.
I wish you luck!
Scatter like petals!
Wither and fall!
Serves you right!
I'm relentless!
The flower's been cut...
I have been making big gains lately! Nice of you to notice!
Yeah, I'm still working on my arms. They'll bulk up soon though, you'll see.
I feel like I'm getting to know you. Hey, how about we go for a run? Friends always train together.
My kingdom, Firene, was entrusted with the ring of Emblem Celica. Maybe you've heard of her?
I usually get fresh flowers for my crown when they start to wilt. Ever since I got to Askr, though, they just...haven't.
I've seen some Heroes with amazingly huge muscles around here! I need to learn their secrets.
I'm happy to spend time with you, if you'd like to sit and chat. Oh, are you feeling sleepy? Let me sing you a lullaby!
All right.
We fight for peace!
Of course.
